name: Knightly Sir Glitch
description:
Guide brave Sir Glitch as he returns the crown to the castle.

This is just a little prototype game for the Godot Wild Jam #10, theme "Glitch".  
https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-10

I had planned for there to be goblins to fight, but ran out of time.  I doubt I'll come back to "finish" this.  It was just for fun and some Godot experience.  

Go to the cave on the first screen.  It might not be obvious.
